name: Back to the Roots - Roody McBeer
name_original: Back to the Roots - Roody McBeer
description:
Game developed in 48hours during the GGJ2023 - check out the page for more info. 

Ey, I am Roody McBeer. I am a free living plant. Until the day I was brutally ripped out of the earth. By a human! The humans carried me in the city and implanted me as a potted plant. From the first day I was planning my escape. One day I seized the chance, jerked back and forth an then.... "Plop" I was free!!! 

You are playing Roody McBeer. Bring him back in the forest, back to the roots.
